description: Disable CPU power management in BIOS settings to reduce thermal load
Update BIOS to latest version (fixes thermal throttling and performance issues)
Replace factory thermal paste with high-quality paste (e.g., Thermal Grizzly, PTM7950)
Download specific NVIDIA/Intel driver version from Dell support to fix conflicts
Use HWiNFO, ThrottleStop, or similar tools to monitor and control thermals
Perform hard reset by holding power button for 15-20 seconds
Contact Dell support for warranty replacement of defective component
Enable battery saver mode, adjust BIOS battery charge configuration
Undervolt CPU/GPU using XTU or similar tools to reduce heat
Reset Windows power management settings using PowerCFG commands
